games.name: Ascension
games.desc: Fantasy deck-builder with faction-based synergies. Collect heroes and structures to enrich your deck or defeat monsters to gain honor!

games.name: Dominion
games.desc: Renaissance deck-builder with modular buy-cards. Purchase cards to strenthen your purchasing power and collect victory point cards!

games.name: Mycelia
games.desc: Fantasy deck-builder with board management. Collect mushroom people to improve your deck and bring dewdrops from your board to the Shrine of Life!
